channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SINEC NMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SINEC NMS

item.title: CVE-2024-23812|2024-08-16T19:11:29.535Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V2.0 SP1). The affected application incorrectly neutralizes special elements when creating a report which could lead to command injection.

item.title: CVE-2024-41939|2024-08-13T14:21:41.360Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application does not properly enforce authorization checks. This could allow an authenticated attacker to bypass the checks and elevate their privileges on the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-41940|2024-08-13T14:23:29.960Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application does not properly validate user input to a privileged command queue. This could allow an authenticated attacker to execute OS commands with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-41938|2024-08-13T07:54:30.281Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The importCertificate function of the SINEC NMS Control web application contains a path traversal vulnerability. This could allow an authenticated attacker it to delete arbitrary certificate files on the drive SINEC NMS is installed on.

item.title: CVE-2024-41939|2024-08-13T07:54:31.595Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application does not properly enforce authorization checks. This could allow an authenticated attacker to bypass the checks and elevate their privileges on the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-36398|2024-08-13T07:54:08.979Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application executes a subset of its services as `NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM`. This could allow a local attacker to execute operating system commands with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-41941|2024-08-13T07:54:34.225Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application does not properly enforce authorization checks. This could allow an authenticated attacker to bypass the checks and modify settings in the application without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2023-46280|2024-08-13T07:53:49.818Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected applications contain an out of bounds read vulnerability. This could allow an attacker to cause a Blue Screen of Death (BSOD) crash of the underlying Windows kernel.

item.title: CVE-2024-41940|2024-08-13T07:54:32.926Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application does not properly validate user input to a privileged command queue. This could allow an authenticated attacker to execute OS commands with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-31978|2024-04-09T08:34:44.145Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V2.0 SP2). Affected devices allow authenticated users to export monitoring data. The corresponding API endpoint is susceptible to path traversal and could allow an authenticated attacker to download files from the file system. Under certain circumstances the downloaded files are deleted from the file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-31978|2024-08-02T01:59:50.835Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V2.0 SP2). Affected devices allow authenticated users to export monitoring data. The corresponding API endpoint is susceptible to path traversal and could allow an authenticated attacker to download files from the file system. Under certain circumstances the downloaded files are deleted from the file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-41941|2024-08-13T13:18:22.820Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application does not properly enforce authorization checks. This could allow an authenticated attacker to bypass the checks and modify settings in the application without authorization.

item.title: CVE-2024-36398|2024-08-13T13:26:17.671Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The affected application executes a subset of its services as `NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM`. This could allow a local attacker to execute operating system commands with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-41938|2024-08-13T13:18:07.307Z -- siemens -- sinec%20nms
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINEC NMS (All versions < V3.0). The importCertificate function of the SINEC NMS Control web application contains a path traversal vulnerability. This could allow an authenticated attacker it to delete arbitrary certificate files on the drive SINEC NMS is installed on.
